com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility.prorated

Interface ProratedAccrual

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProratedFixedRateAccrual, ProratedFloatingRateAccrual

    public interface ProratedAccrual
    Interface that all accrual (fixed and floating) classes implement to support pricing.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getStartDate

        java.time.LocalDate getStartDate()
        Returns:
        accrual period start date

      • getEndDate

        java.time.LocalDate getEndDate()
        Returns:
        accrual period end date which may or may not coincide with payment date

      • getPaymentDate

        Optional<java.time.LocalDate> getPaymentDate()
        Returns:
        optional payment date, for implementing interest-on-paydown sub-accrual exception

      • getAllInRate

        double getAllInRate()
        Returns:
        total annual cash interest rate, this DOES NOT include the PIK spread

      • getPikSpread

        double getPikSpread()
        Returns:
        total annual pay-in-kind interest rate

      • getAccrualAmount

        com.opengamma.strata.basics.currency.CurrencyAmount getAccrualAmount()
        Returns:
        accrual amount in specified currency

      • getDayCount

        com.opengamma.strata.basics.date.DayCount getDayCount()
        Returns:
        day count basis to be used for calculations

      • getPaymentFrequency

        com.opengamma.strata.basics.schedule.Frequency getPaymentFrequency()
        Returns:
        accrual payment frequency

      • getPaymentProjection

        com.opengamma.strata.basics.currency.CurrencyAmount getPaymentProjection()
        Returns:
        calculated projected cash payment amount

      • getPikProjection

        com.opengamma.strata.basics.currency.CurrencyAmount getPikProjection()
        Returns:
        calculated projected PIK capitalization amount
